tool_description: Access live scores, odds, game recaps, and post-match interviews from all major cricket leagues worldwide. Stay updated with the latest developments in cricket, covering matches from various leagues across the globe.
name: Cricket Highlights API
title: Cricket Highlights API

api_list.name: TeamsController_getTeams
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all teams.

api_list.name: LeaguesController_getLeagues
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all leagues.

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: Country code specified by the ISO 3166 standard.

api_list.name: LeaguesController_getLeagueById
api_list.description: Retrieve league details by league id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com/leagues/48513362"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com/leagues/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: CountriesController_getCountryById
api_list.description: Retrieve country details by country code.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: A string value code of the country, following the ISO 3166 standard.

api_list.name: CountriesController_getAllCountries
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all supported.

api_list.name: HighlightsController_getHighlights
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all highlights.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date that follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: Country code specified by the ISO 3166 standard.

url.description: Url location of the video highlight.

code.description: Country code specified by the ISO 3166 standard.

format.description: Cricket match format, e.g. T20, ODI, TEST

dayType.description: Information that tells us whether the match will be played across multiple days

report.description: Descriptive report of the match based on the match status.

totalCount.description: Available number of items, relevant to the provided query.

message.description: Explanation message regarding your current tier.

api_list.name: HighlightsController_getHighlightById

api_list.name: MatchesController_getMatches
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all matches. At least one parameter has to be specified.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date that follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.
